1: I seek your guidance and loving correction.
2: I find strength and healing through compassionate support.
3: I seek comfort and hope in the divine.
4: I trust in your mercy to uplift and save me.
5: I focus on gratitude and appreciation in every moment I have.
6: I find strength and comfort through my struggles and emotions.
7: I find strength and renewal despite challenges around me.
8: The LORD hears my cries and brings me comfort.
9: My prayers are received and answered.
10: I find strength and confidence in overcoming challenges.
